import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Card, Button, Image} from 'react-bootstrap' import products from '../products' function ProductScreen({ match }) { const product = products.find((p) => p._id == match.params.id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}
) } export default ProductScreen
